text: Arturo Hammersley (21 May 1922 - 1 September 2014) was a Chilean alpine skier. He competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics and the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Chilean male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Chile Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Valparaíso
title: Arturo Hammersley
